Ease of use Next, you also want to look for tools that aren‚Äôt overly difficult to use. Amazon PPC can be complex, so the tools you use won‚Äôt always be the simplest. Amazon advertising PPC AI is a subject that gets a lot of debate. Some will say it‚Äôs worthwhile, some will say you‚Äôre better off manually carrying out Amazon advertising bulk operations. The reality is, the AI being used by Amazon Sponsored Ads management tools is relatively simplistic using ‚Äòif this then that‚Äô rule-sets. For example, if ACOS hits 40%, then reduce bids by 10%.
